segments.text: I'm watching the children on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on what looks like a very unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it appears to be tilting backward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching way up towards the open cabinet where the cookie jar is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the jar, grabbing cookies, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races a little watching his precarious balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, reaching up with an open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup looks like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if that stool collapses under his weight?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and seriously hurt himself on the counter below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a strong sense of worry for their safety in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet objective.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit anxious about this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
